Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the FBI confirmed that George Soros was funding a migrant caravan, when there is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there are no links to news reports, FBI bulletins, or credible news reports suggesting that the FBI made such an announcement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the funding of the migrant caravan by George Soros is a fact, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations and ignores the lack of evidence supporting the claim.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence to support the claim of George Soros funding the migrant caravan.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on social media posts and conspiracy theories without providing any credible sources or evidence.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in the claim.
